CustomField.description: -Analyses business information to proactively address changing market conditions, ensure division operates within budgetary guidelines, & achieves profit margin goals -Integrates business information into business plans -Develop & effectively promote ideas for improving services & maximising customer services satisfaction -Ensure that HT services, products & events attain the appropriate publicity

CustomField.label: Business Mgmt/Brand(Product)awareness
